address: Xã Chiềng Cọ, Thành phố Sơn La, Tỉnh Sơn La
thought:
**Finding the New Administrative Unit for the Old Address**

Okay, so I've got to figure out the new administrative unit for "Xã Chiềng Cọ, Thành phố Sơn La, Tỉnh Sơn La."  First, I'll establish the province: "Tỉnh Sơn La."  I've got a good grasp of the relevant resolutions.

My initial step is to consult resolution 60-NQ/TW, which covers province-level reorganizations. Thankfully, Sơn La isn't listed for any such action; it remains "Tỉnh Sơn La." Easy enough.

Now, the focus shifts to the ward itself, "Xã Chiềng Cọ." I'm checking the "Other resolutions" for "Tỉnh Sơn La," specifically Resolution 1681/NQ-UBTVQH15, the one related to rearranging communes within Sơn La.

I quickly scanned the relevant text. I saw that lines 24 and 63 are most important. Line 24 had "Xã Chiềng Hoa" - which I didn't care about here. Line 63 is the winner. This line specifies that "Xã Chiềng Cọ" is merged with "phường Chiềng Cơi" and "xã Hua La" to form "phường Chiềng Cơi".

I then looked at the list of wards that were *not* merged. "Xã Chiềng Cọ" was absent from the list, confirming my prior findings.

So, according to line 63, "Xã Chiềng Cọ" is now part of "phường Chiềng Cơi." To be completely sure, I'll cross-check this result with the "New wards" list.

I've searched the list, and there it is: {"ward_code":"03670","ward_name":"Phường Chiềng Cơi","province_name":"Tỉnh Sơn La"}. Perfect match. High confidence in this finding. I can now construct the output.

citation.header: 1681/NQ-UBTVQH15: Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của tỉnh Sơn La
citation.line: 63. Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số của phường Chiềng Cơi, xã Hua La và xã Chiềng Cọ thành phường mới có tên gọi là phường Chiềng Cơi.
